definitions.definition: A float moored in water to mark a location , warn of danger , indicate a navigational channel or for other purposes
A sign where the non- dominant hand is held in a stationary configuration as a landmark for meaning associations with the dominant hand.

main_definition: ( nautical ) A float moored in water to mark a location , warn of danger , indicate a navigational channel or for other purposes
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics , sign language ) A sign where the non- dominant hand is held in a stationary configuration as a landmark for meaning associations with the dominant hand.
